include-poly.title: Include Poly
include-poly.description: Comma-separated URL(s) of .poly file(s) defining regions to include

default-view.title: Default View
default-view.description: Default map view as longitude,latitude,zoom (e.g. 7.416,43.731,12). Sets the initial center and zoom level of the map when UI loads.

file-name.title: ZIM filename
file-name.description: ZIM filename. Do not input trailing `.zim`, it will be automatically added. Defaults to {name}_{period}

tags.title: ZIM tags
tags.description: Semicolon (;) delimited list of tags to add to the ZIM

secondary-color.title: Secondary Color
secondary-color.description: Secondary (background) color of ZIM UI. Hex/HTML syntax (#424242)

illustration-url.title: Illustration URL
illustration-url.description: URL to illustration to use for ZIM illustration and favicon

include_up_to_zoom.title: Include Up To Zoom
include_up_to_zoom.description: Include all tiles up to this zoom level, ignoring any poly filtering

area.title: Area
area.description: Area to download, either planet or monaco

stats-filename.title: Stats Filename
stats-filename.description: Scraping progress file. Leave it as `/output/task_progress.json`
